alert.note: Alert for Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Interior York; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 20 at 12:03AM EST until January 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...SNOW IMPACTS THE AREA TONIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 4 and 7 inches for a storm total of 6 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and western Maine. Portions of central and northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...A snowstorm will bring plowable snow to the region with a period of moderate travel impacts expected. Periods of moderate snow and low visibility will be the biggest hazards. The potential exists for snowbands that will bring periods of locally heavy snowfall, which will lead to rapid snow accumulations and extremely dangerous travel conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
